commit message:
Merge pull request #506 from Grunthos/master

Release 5.0.8
Change wish list to Amazon US Kindle list for US-based ID
Fix for issue 505 - NPE when text changed and not present

Always send message in 'Send Information', even if no files found

These days, the information contains more useful debugging data than
just files.
Coerce boolean to long if necessary (0,1)

Fix problem with covers from Gallery in KitKat

KitKat now has a new and nifty file browser and ACTION_GET_CONTENT
returns a different format message. So, for KitKat and beyond we use the
content resolver to give us a stream (which is what we have always done
for file explorers etc as well).

This is the dutch translation

added Duch nl_NL translation. Except CDATA

Update strings.xml

translation of CDATE strings added.

Update strings.xml

some correction of typos, some more CDATE translations.

5.0.9 Release changes

Quick release for KitKat, translations and minor fixes
